an9.26:4.1: () Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca candikāputto rājagahe viharanti veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
an9.26:4.2: Tatra kho āyasmā candikāputto bhikkhū āmantesi ():
an9.26:4.4: ‘yato kho, āvuso, bhikkhuno cetasā citaṃ hoti, tassetaṃ bhikkhuno kallaṃ veyyākaraṇāya—
an9.26:4.5: khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyāti pajānāmī’”ti.
an9.26:5.1: Evaṃ vutte, āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṃ candikāputtaṃ etadavoca:
an9.26:5.2: “na kho, āvuso candikāputta, devadatto bhikkhūnaṃ evaṃ dhammaṃ deseti:
an9.26:5.3: ‘yato kho, āvuso, bhikkhuno cetasā citaṃ hoti, tassetaṃ bhikkhuno kallaṃ veyyākaraṇāya—
an9.26:5.4: khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyāti pajānāmī’ti.
an9.26:5.5: Evañca kho, āvuso, candikāputta, devadatto bhikkhūnaṃ dhammaṃ deseti:
an9.26:5.6: ‘yato kho, āvuso, bhikkhuno cetasā cittaṃ suparicitaṃ hoti, tassetaṃ bhikkhuno kallaṃ veyyākaraṇāya—
an9.26:5.7: khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyāti pajānāmī’”ti.

an9.26:8.1: Kathañca, āvuso, bhikkhuno cetasā cittaṃ suparicitaṃ hoti?
an9.26:8.2: ‘Vītarāgaṃ me cittan’ti cetasā cittaṃ suparicitaṃ hoti;
an9.26:8.3: ‘vītadosaṃ me cittan’ti cetasā cittaṃ suparicitaṃ hoti;
an9.26:8.4: ‘vītamohaṃ me cittan’ti cetasā cittaṃ suparicitaṃ hoti;
an9.26:8.5: ‘asarāgadhammaṃ me cittan’ti cetasā cittaṃ suparicitaṃ hoti;
an9.26:8.6: ‘asadosadhammaṃ me cittan’ti cetasā cittaṃ suparicitaṃ hoti;
an9.26:8.7: ‘asamohadhammaṃ me cittan’ti cetasā cittaṃ suparicitaṃ hoti;
an9.26:8.8: ‘anāvattidhammaṃ me cittaṃ kāmabhavāyā’ti cetasā cittaṃ suparicitaṃ hoti;
an9.26:8.9: ‘anāvattidhammaṃ me cittaṃ rūpabhavāyā’ti cetasā cittaṃ suparicitaṃ hoti;
an9.26:8.10: ‘anāvattidhammaṃ me cittaṃ arūpabhavāyā’ti cetasā cittaṃ suparicitaṃ hoti.
an9.26:8.11: Evaṃ sammā vimuttacittassa kho, āvuso, bhikkhuno bhusā cepi cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā cakkhussa āpāthaṃ āgacchanti, nevassa cittaṃ pariyādiyanti;
an9.26:8.12: amissīkatamevassa cittaṃ hoti ṭhitaṃ āneñjappattaṃ, vayaṃ cassānupassati.
an9.26:9.2: Tassassu aṭṭha kukkū heṭṭhā nemaṅgamā, aṭṭha kukkū upari nemassa.
an9.26:9.3: Atha puratthimāya cepi disāya āgaccheyya bhusā vātavuṭṭhi, neva naṃ saṅkampeyya na sampavedheyya;
an9.26:9.6: atha dakkhiṇāya cepi disāya āgaccheyya bhusā vātavuṭṭhi, neva naṃ saṅkampeyya na sampavedheyya.
an9.26:9.9: Evamevaṃ kho, āvuso, sammā vimuttacittassa bhikkhuno bhusā cepi cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā cakkhussa āpāthaṃ āgacchanti, nevassa cittaṃ pariyādiyanti;
an9.26:9.10: amissīkatamevassa cittaṃ hoti ṭhitaṃ āneñjappattaṃ, vayaṃ cassānupassati.
an9.26:10.5: manoviññeyyā dhammā manassa āpāthaṃ āgacchanti, nevassa cittaṃ pariyādiyanti;
an9.26:10.6: amissīkatamevassa cittaṃ hoti ṭhitaṃ āneñjappattaṃ, vayaṃ cassānupassatī”ti.
